StartUpView_SelectionBody: Willst du ein neues Schlüsselpaar erstellen oder ein bestehendes importieren?
EULAView_Body_Intro: Diese Endnutzerlizenz Vereinbarung ist ein Vertrag zwischen dir und Lightning Digital Entertainment Inc. über die Nutzung unserer mobile Anwendung current. Durch das Installieren und Benutzen der Anwendung erklärst du dich mit den Geschäftsbedingungen dieser Lizenzvereinbarung einverstanden.
EULAView_H3_ProhibitedList_1: Du stimmst zu current nicht zum erstellen, hochladen, veröffentlichen, senden oder sichern von Inhalten zu nutzen, die:
EULAView_Body_ProhibitedList_1_1: * Illegal oder betrügerisch sind, oder die Rechte Dritter verletzen.
EULAView_Body_ProhibitedList_1_4: * Is discriminatory or promotes hate speech
EULAView_Body_ProhibitedList_1_6: * Is intended to harass or bully others
EULAView_H3_ProhibitedList_2: You also agree not to engage in any conduct that:
EULAView_Body_ProhibitedList_2_3: * Is intended to intimidate or threaten others
EULAView_Body_ProhibitedList_2_4: * Is intended to promote or incite violence
EULAView_Body_Consequences: Any violation of this EULA, including the prohibited content and conduct outlined above, may result in the termination of your access to our application.
EULAView_H2_Disclaimer: Disclaimer of Warranties and Limitation of Liability
EULAView_Body_Disclaimer: Our application is provided -as is- and -as available- without warranty of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. We do not guarantee that our application will be uninterrupted or error-free. In no event shall Lightning Digital Entertainment Inc. be liable for any damages whatsoever, including but not limited to direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages, arising out of or in connection with the use or inability to use our application.
EULAView_Body_Changes: We reserve the right to undate or modifv this EULA at an time and without prior notice. Your continued use of our application following any changes to this EULA will be deemed to be your acceptance of such changes.
EULAView_Body_Contact: If you have any questions about this EULA, please contact us at hello@getcurrent.io
EULAView_Body_Acceptance: By using our Application, you signify your acceptance of this EULA. If you do not agree to this EULA, you may not use our Application.
